attributes.action: Scrap national curriculum and implement individual curriculums
attributes.additional_details: The current national curriculum does not cater for non academic students, as a result, these children leave school feeling failures. We need to make changes to cater for every single child.
attributes.background: I want the government to scrap the current national curriculums in schools and implement individual ones. Every child has a right to thrive in education. Currently this is not the case.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned that the current national curriculum does not meet the needs of all students, but we're not sure how you want 'individual curriculums' to work, or how these would be set.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
